summary: This document is an email chain from May 21, 2021, concerning a request from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York for the name and contact information of the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (DOJ-OIG) attorney handling the Epstein investigation. The request is noted as time-sensitive, and the chain shows internal follow-up attempts.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The individual from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York who sent the initial time-sensitive request for the OIG attorney's contact information handling the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Request for OIG Attorney Contact
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY sends a time-sensitive request for the name and contact information of the DOJ-OIG attorney handling the Epstein investigation.

locations: United States Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York
keyFacts: On May 21, 2021, an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY made a time-sensitive request for the contact details of the DOJ-OIG attorney assigned to the Epstein investigation.
The email chain indicates internal follow-up was occurring within the DOJ/OGC regarding this request.
The document shows ongoing communication and coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the DOJ-OIG concerning the Epstein investigation in 2021.
